title: Realizing Access to Safe Inclusive Sustainable and Climate-Resilient Drinking Water Sanitation and Hygiene for All
description: IsWASH 2023 symposium proceedings covering sustainable WASH infrastructure, climate resilience, and inclusive access to water and sanitation services in Indonesia.
author: Multiple Authors

title: The Role of Regulatory Frameworks in Ensuring The Sustainability of Community-Based Water and Sanitation
description: Comprehensive research report on regulatory frameworks for community-based water and sanitation systems in Indonesia, including field studies from East Nusa Tenggara and East Java.
author: Mohamad Mova Al'Afghani et al
notes: Major research output with UNESCO partnership

title: UNICEF Water Sanitation and Hygiene Research Agenda
description: Research agenda document for WASH research priorities in collaboration with UNICEF.
author: UNICEF/CRPG

title: Trends in WASH Research Indonesia
description: Analysis of water sanitation and hygiene research trends in Indonesia.
author: CRPG

title: Regulation of Persistent Organic Pollutants in Indonesia - Main Report
description: Major research report on POPs and PCB regulation in Indonesia, produced in collaboration with UNIDO and Ministry of Environment and Forestry. Includes 6 annexes covering international conventions, regulatory frameworks, and institutional arrangements.
author: Mohamad Mova Al'Afghani et al
notes: Major environmental regulation research - multi-part report

title: Indonesia OGP-IRM End of Term Report 2013-2015
description: Independent assessment of Indonesia's Open Government Partnership commitments and implementation for the 2013-2015 period.
author: CRPG (Independent Reviewer)

title: Increasing Local Government Responsibility for Communal Scale Sanitation - Part 1
description: Research report on local government roles in communal sanitation systems in Indonesia. Collaboration with University of Technology Sydney.
author: CRPG/UTS Researchers

title: Policy Brief 01/2021: Water Allocation Issues Under Law 17/2019
description: Policy brief analyzing five key water allocation issues under Indonesia's Water Law 17/2019.
author: Mohamad Mova Al'Afghani

title: Seri Kajian Rancangan Undang Undang Sumber Daya Air
description: Policy analysis series on Indonesia's Water Resources Bill (RUU SDA).
author: Mohamad Mova Al'Afghani

title: Kertas Posisi Masukan Jejaring AMPL untuk RUU SDA
description: Position paper from WASH network (Jejaring AMPL) providing input on Water Resources Bill.
